text: In any case, make sure you get a good deal of hearts in the segment leading up to the hallway. Otherwise you'll be screwed.
author: jbdfj djfjkdhf

text: But even if you have the holy water, you'll be vulnerable to hits by the scythes. Another tip: The place in which you come off of the stairs won't leave you vulnerable to Medusa's. They'll go under you.
author: jbdfj djfjkdhf

author: Jagar Tharn

text: Works like a charm. The only problem is Death. Since you no longer have the holy water (picked up earlier in the stage), you'll be vulnerable.

author: Othello

text: I somehow like this more than the two "iconic" Castlevania themes (Vampire Killer and Bloody Tears). It gives more of a feeling of a slow journey through a hostile land, whilst those two bring to mind a frantic battle to stay alive. Not that this level wasn't hard, though.
